paw_structure.structure_radial¶

Plotting of radial distribution function.

Usage in command line:

paw_structure_radial [-i; --integrate] filename

filename is the name of the radial distribution function file XXX REFERENCE XXX

-i is a flag to include the coordination number obtained from integration

Dependencies:

sys radial utility

main()

Entry point for structure_radial
paw_structure.structure_radial.main()¶

Entry point for structure_radial
